reset_history.name: Reset History
reset_history.description: Reset the 7-day rolling history for a zone. Use this after insulation work or to clear anomalous data. The insulation rating will be recalculated from scratch.

zone_name.name: Zone Name
zone_name.description: The name of the zone to reset (case insensitive)

reset_all.name: Reset All Data
reset_all.description: Completely reset ALL calibration data for a zone. Use when measurements were taken during unusual conditions (many guests, oven running, etc.) or to start fresh calibration.

zone_name.name: Zone Name
zone_name.description: The name of the zone to completely reset (case insensitive)

user.title: Zone Configuration
user.description: Configure a zone to analyze. You can add multiple zones by adding the integration again.

data_description.zone_name: Unique name to identify this room (e.g., Bedroom, Living Room)
data_description.heating_entity: Switch, thermostat or climate controlling the heating
data_description.heater_power: Nominal heater power in Watts (required for electric, optional for others)
data_description.efficiency_factor: Converts consumed energy to thermal output. Electric: 1.0, Heat pump: 2.5-4.0 (COP), Gas boiler: 0.85-0.95, Gas furnace: 0.78-0.90

dimensions.title: Dimensions and optional sensors
dimensions.description: These parameters are optional but allow for more precise analysis.

data_description.surface: Floor area to calculate K coefficient per m²
data_description.volume: Volume to calculate K coefficient per m³
data_description.power_sensor: Instantaneous power sensor to measure actual heating time and consumption
data_description.power_threshold: Power in Watts above which heating is considered active (default: 50W)
data_description.energy_sensor: Existing Home Assistant energy meter (takes priority over integrated calculation)
data_description.window_sensor: Physical window/door contact sensor for accurate open detection (instead of temperature-based)
data_description.weather_entity: Weather entity for wind data (shared between zones)
data_description.room_orientation: Main facade orientation to determine wind exposure

notifications.title: Window Alert Notifications
notifications.description: Get notified when a window is open while heating is running.

data_description.window_notification_enabled: Send a push notification when window is open and heating is active
data_description.notify_device: Select the mobile device to receive notifications
data_description.notification_delay: Wait this many minutes before alerting (avoids alerts for quick openings)
